item.title: I will be serving as a Mentor at the NAACL 2022 Student Research Workshop!
item.description: I will be serving as a Mentor at the NAACL 2022 Student Research Workshop. If you are currently a student, consider submitting your completed work, or work in progress to the workshop.

item.title: I will be serving as a Mentor at the ACL 2022 Student Research Workshop!
item.description: I will be serving as a Mentor at the ACL 2022 Student Research Workshop. If you are currently a student, consider submitting your completed work, or work in progress to the workshop.

item.title: Long Paper accepted at MRL-EMNLP 2021!
item.description:
Our paper Vyākarana: A Colorless Green Benchmark for Syntactic Evaluation in Indic Languages has been accpeted for presentation at the First Workshop on Multilingual Representation Learning at EMNLP 2021.

You can check out the code and dataset here!

item.title: I'll be serving as a PC member at the MRL 2021 workshop at EMNLP 2021
item.description: I will be serving as the member of the Program Committe for the First Workshop on Multilingual Representation Learning at EMNLP 2021.

item.title: System Demonstration Paper accepted at EMNLP 2021!
item.description:
Our paper DRIFT: A Toolkit for Diachronic Analysis of Scientific Literature has been accpeted for presentation at the EMNLP 2021 conference.

You can check out the demo for the system here!

item.title: I'll be giving a talk on Getting Started with ML at an ACM BITS Goa event!
item.description: I’ll be giving a talk on “Getting Started with ML” at an ACM BITS Goa event! You can attend the talk on a YouTube livestream here on 28th July 7:30PM IST.

item.title: I have joined TCS Research as a Pre-doctoral Research Fellow!
item.description: I have joined TCS Research as a Pre-doctoral Research Fellow, where I’ll be co-advised by Dr. Lovekesh Vig and Dr. Gautam Shroff. My work will broadly focus on “Program Synthesis from Natural Language”.

item.title: Paper on Syntactic Evaluation in Indic languages accepted at ACL-IJCNLP SRW 2021!
item.description:
Our paper Vyākarana: A Colorless Green Benchmark for Syntactic Evaluation in Indic Languages has been accpeted for presentation at the ACL-IJCNLP Student Research Workshop, 2021.

This work was funded by the Cognitive Neuroscience Lab at BITS Goa, and mentored by Prof. Greg Durrett, UT Austin during the pre-submission mentoring stage at the workshop.

item.title: I'll be attending the Fifth Summer School on Statistical Methods for Linguistics and Psychology, 6-10 September 2021!
item.description:
I’ll be attending the Fifth Summer School on Statistical Methods for Linguistics and Psychology (Foundational methods in frequentist statistics track - class of 30 students), 6-10 September 2021. Shoot me an e-mail or catch me at the summer school!

This summer school is organized by Prof. Shravan Vasishth, University of Potsdam.

item.title: I'll be contributing to a tutorial on Transformer models at Neuromatch DL Summer School!
item.description:
I’ll be contributing to a tutorial on Transformer models for NLP at the Neuromatch DL Summer School. This lecture will be taught by Prof. He He, NYU.

Do sign-up for the summer school if interested in an Introduction to Deep Learning!

item.title: I'll be participating in a round table discussion at the International CCCP Symposium 2020!
item.description: I’ll be participating in a round table discussion at the International CCCP Symposium 2020. I’ll be talking about the current state of data and resources in the study of Syntactic Processing!

item.title: I'll be attending COLING 2020 to present our work on Humor Grading and Counterfactual Detection!
item.description:
I’ll be attending COLING 2020 to present our work on Humor Grading and Counterfactual Detection! Shoot me an e-mail or catch me at the conference socials!

This conference visit is funded by the Cognitive Neuroscience Lab at BITS Goa.

item.title: I'll be attending the Google Research AI Summer School 2020!
item.description: “I have been shortlisted to attend the first Google Research AI Summer School (2020)! Shoot me an e-mail or catch me at the conference socials!

item.title: Paper on Counterfactual Detection accepted at SemEval 2020!
item.description: Our paper CNRL at SemEval-2020 Task 5: Modelling Causal Reasoning in Language with Multi-Head Self-Attention Weights Based Counterfactual Detection has been accpeted for publication at the International Workshop on Semantic Evaluation, 2020.

item.title: Paper on Humor Grading accepted at SemEval 2020!
item.description: Our paper LRG at SemEval-2020 Task 7: Assessing the Ability of BERT and Derivative Models to Perform Short-Edits Based Humor Grading has been accpeted for publication at the International Workshop on Semantic Evaluation, 2020.

item.title: Paper on Propaganda Detection accepted at SemEval 2020!
item.description: Our paper BPGC at SemEval-2020 Task 11: Propaganda Detection in News Articles with Multi-Granularity Knowledge Sharing and Linguistic Features Based Ensemble Learning has been accpeted for publication at the International Workshop on Semantic Evaluation, 2020.

item.title: Neuroscience & AI Reading Course starts at CNRL BITS Goa!
item.description: I’ll be taking up the Teaching Assitantship duty for the Neuroscience & AI Reading Course at the Cognitive Neuroscience Lab at BITS Goa. We’ll be covering the following topics: Syntactic Processing, Grounded Language Learning, Models of Mental Lexicon Development, Neural Correlates of Discourse Coherence, and Brain Embeddings. Shoot me an e-mail to enroll in the course!
